title.rendered: Dubai vs Desert, International League, 2023: Today’s Match Preview, Fantasy Cricket Team

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on the recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

Dubai: Niroshan Dickwella (wk), George Munsey, Rovman Powell (c), Dasun Shanaka, Yusuf Pathan, Sikandar Raza, Chamika Karunaratne, Hazrat Luqman, Adam Zampa, Akif Raja, Fred Klaassen

Desert: Rohan Mustafa, Alex Hales, Colin Munro (c), Sam Billings (wk), Sherfane Rutherford, Benny Howell, Wanindu Hasaranga, Luke Wood, Gus Atkinson, Sheldon Cottrell, Shiraz Ahmed

Venue: Dubai International Stadium, Dubai

Pitch Report

(Based on the last 3 games)

1st innings average score: 150

2nd innings average score: 148

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced wicket

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Rovman Powell is the leading run-getter (287 at 57) for Dubai in this edition, and has been a part of the Ultimate Team in his last 5 games.

Meanwhile, Alex Hales is the tournament’s highest run-scorer (438 at 73), including 3 half-centuries in his last 4 outings at Dubai.

When these teams met earlier in the competition, Adam Zampa (3 for 16) and Colin Munro (40 off 32) were the captain and vice-captain of the Ultimate Team respectively. Also, Zampa is also the only bowler to have taken a hat-trick of three-fors in this league.

Only Naveen-ul-Haq has managed to bag a five-wicket haul at Dubai in 9 games this season.

It has been a rough time for Rohan Mustafa lately. In this tournament, he has already been dismissed for a single-digit figure on 5 occasions. With the ball, he has managed only 3 wickets in 8 games.

2 out of 3 fifties registered in the last 3 games at the venue have belonged to openers.
